databaseConfig.sql: SELECT MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MS_CUSTOMER_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.NAME , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MAIL_ADDRESS , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.RENEW_DATE , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.TS , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.TEL , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.FAX FROM MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU

SELECT MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MS_CUSTOMER_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.NAME , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MAIL_ADDRESS , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.RENEW_USER_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.RENEW_DATE , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.TS , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.TEL , MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.FAX FROM MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU WHERE MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU.MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID = :MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID

INSERT INTO MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU ( MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID , MS_CUSTOMER_ID , NAME , MAIL_ADDRESS , TEL , FAX , RENEW_USER_ID , RENEW_DATE , TS ) VALUES ( :MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID , :MS_CUSTOMER_ID , :NAME , :MAIL_ADDRESS , :TEL , :FAX , :RENEW_USER_ID , :RENEW_DATE , :TS )

UPDATE MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU SET MS_CUSTOMER_ID = :MS_CUSTOMER_ID , NAME = :NAME , MAIL_ADDRESS = :MAIL_ADDRESS , TEL = :TEL, FAX = :FAX, RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID = :MS_CUSTOMER_TANTOU_ID
